description: Type definitions for the 'nanoid/async' module, providing asynchronous functions to generate secure, URL-friendly unique IDs and random bytes. It includes functions for creating IDs with default or custom alphabets and sizes, all returning promises.

methods.name: export function nanoid(size?: number): Promise<string> nanoid
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a secure URL-friendly unique ID, defaulting to a 21-symbol string, returning a promise.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a low-level function to generate secure IDs with a custom alphabet, returning a promise.

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates an array of random bytes from hardware noise, returning a promise.
